text: Ludwig Emilio Buale Coka (born 26 November 1972) is an Equatoguinean-born Spanish actor. He is best known worldwide for his role as Baharat in the movie The Platform (2019). He is also known for roles in Bwana and La que se avecina. Buale was born in Equatorial Guinea and is a Bubi. He moved to Spain at the age of six. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Equatoguinean people Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors
title: Emilio Buale
